original_text:
He would not let me catch my breath
    but would overwhelm me with misery.
korean_text: 나를 숨 쉬지 못하게 하시며 괴로움을 내게 채우시는구나

sentences.original_text: He would not let me catch my breath
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내가 숨을 쉴 틈도 주지 않았다

sentences.original_text: but would overwhelm me with misery
